trans-unit.source: This enum type describes types of render policies available.
trans-unit.target: 该枚举类型描述了可用的渲染策略类型。

trans-unit.source: This enum type describes which strategy to choose when editing values in the database.
trans-unit.target: 这个枚举类型描述了在数据库中编辑值时要选择的策略。

trans-unit.source: This enum type holds the invalid values for type definitions.
trans-unit.target: 这个枚举类型持有类型定义的无效值。

trans-unit.source: This enum type holds the type of the error that occurred:
trans-unit.target: 这个枚举类型保存着发生错误的类型。

trans-unit.source: This enum type holds the type of the requested resource:
trans-unit.target: 这个枚举类型持有请求资源的类型。

trans-unit.source: This enum type indicates how the operating system should schedule newly created threads.
trans-unit.target: 这个枚举类型表示操作系统应该如何调度新创建的线程。

trans-unit.source: This enum type is used by QPrinter to tell the application program how to print.
trans-unit.target: QPrinter使用此枚举类型来告诉应用程序如何打印。

trans-unit.source: This enum type is used to configure the behavior related to restoring framebuffer bindings when calling blitFramebuffer().
trans-unit.target: 此枚举类型用于配置与调用blitFramebuffer（）时恢复帧缓冲区绑定有关的行为。

trans-unit.source: This enum type is used to configure the depth and stencil buffers attached to the framebuffer object when it is created.
trans-unit.target: 这个枚举类型用于在创建framebuffer对象时配置附加在该对象上的深度和模板缓冲区。

trans-unit.source: This enum type is used to control which part of the system clipboard is used by QClipboard::mimeData(), QClipboard::setMimeData() and related functions.
trans-unit.target: 此枚举类型用于控制QClipboard :: mimeData（），QClipboard :: setMimeData（）和相关函数使用系统剪贴板的哪一部分。

trans-unit.source: This enum type is used to define some modifier flags. Some of these flags only make sense in the context of printing:
trans-unit.target: 这个枚举类型用于定义一些修饰符标志。其中一些标志只有在打印的情况下才有意义。

trans-unit.source: This enum type is used to describe alignment. It contains horizontal and vertical flags that can be combined to produce the required effect.
trans-unit.target: 这个枚举类型用于描述对齐方式。它包含水平和垂直标志,可以结合起来产生所需的效果。

trans-unit.source: This enum type is used to describe how pixel values should be inverted in the invertPixels() function.
trans-unit.target: 此枚举类型用于描述应如何在invertPixels（）函数中反转像素值。

trans-unit.source: This enum type is used to describe the alpha channels position relative to the color channels.
trans-unit.target: 这个枚举类型用于描述alpha通道相对于颜色通道的位置。

trans-unit.source: This enum type is used to describe the color model of the pixelformat. Alpha was added in 5.5.
trans-unit.target: 这个枚举类型用于描述像素格式的颜色模型。Alpha在5.5中被添加。

trans-unit.source: This enum type is used to indicate whether QPrinter should print in color or not.
trans-unit.target: 此枚举类型用于指示QPrinter是否应以彩色打印。

trans-unit.source: This enum type is used to invoke a special overload of QtConcurrent::QTaskBuilder::spawn(QtConcurrent::FutureResult) that doesn't return a future object.
trans-unit.target: 此枚举类型用于调用QtConcurrent :: QTaskBuilder :: spawn（QtConcurrent :: FutureResult）的特殊重载，该重载不会返回将来的对象。

trans-unit.source: This enum type is used to query for a specific path:
trans-unit.target: 这个枚举类型用于查询一个特定的路径。

trans-unit.source: This enum type is used to specify a specific location specifier:
trans-unit.target: 这个枚举类型用于指定一个特定的位置指定器。

trans-unit.source: This enum type is used to specify the current state of a top-level window.
trans-unit.target: 该枚举类型用于指定顶层窗口的当前状态。

trans-unit.source: This enum type is used to specify the current state of the application.
trans-unit.target: 这个枚举类型用于指定应用程序的当前状态。

trans-unit.source: This enum type is used to specify the measurement unit for page and paper sizes.
trans-unit.target: 该枚举类型用于指定页面和纸张尺寸的测量单位。

trans-unit.source: This enum type is used to specify the measurement unit for page layout and margins.
trans-unit.target: 该枚举类型用于指定页面布局和页边距的测量单位。

trans-unit.source: This enum type is used to specify the measurement unit for page sizes.
trans-unit.target: 该枚举类型用于指定页面尺寸的测量单位。

trans-unit.source: This enum type is used to specify the origin of a QWaylandSurface's buffer.
trans-unit.target: 此枚举类型用于指定QWaylandSurface缓冲区的来源。

trans-unit.source: This enum type is used to specify the product type when registering the product.
trans-unit.target: 该枚举类型用于在注册产品时指定产品类型。

trans-unit.source: This enum type is used to specify the status of the transaction.
trans-unit.target: 这个枚举类型用于指定交易的状态。

trans-unit.source: This enum type is used to specify the subpixel arrangement of a QWaylandOutput.
trans-unit.target: 此枚举类型用于指定QWaylandOutput的子像素排列。

trans-unit.source: This enum type is used to specify the window decoration mode for toplevel windows.
trans-unit.target: 该枚举类型用于指定toplevel窗口的窗口装饰模式。

trans-unit.source: This enum type is used to specify various item properties.
trans-unit.target: 该枚举类型用于指定各种项目属性。

trans-unit.source: This enum type is used to specify various widget attributes. Attributes are set and cleared with QWidget::setAttribute(), and queried with QWidget::testAttribute(), although some have special convenience functions which are mentioned below.
trans-unit.target: 此枚举类型用于指定各种窗口小部件属性。使用QWidget :: setAttribute（）设置和清除属性，并使用QWidget :: testAttribute（）查询属性，尽管其中一些具有特殊的便捷功能，如下所述。

trans-unit.source: This enum type is used to specify various window-system properties for the widget. They are fairly unusual but necessary in a few cases. Some of these flags depend on whether the underlying window manager supports them.
trans-unit.target: 此枚举类型用于指定小组件的各种窗口系统属性。它们相当不寻常,但在少数情况下是必要的。其中一些标志取决于底层窗口管理器是否支持它们。

trans-unit.source: This enum type is used when calling QAction::activate()
trans-unit.target: 调用QAction :: activate（）时使用此枚举类型。

trans-unit.source: This enum type lists the available page sizes as defined in the Postscript PPD standard.
trans-unit.target: 该枚举类型列出了Postscript PPD标准中定义的可用页面尺寸。

trans-unit.source: This enum type lists the available page sizes as defined in the Postscript PPD standard. These values are duplicated in QPagedPaintDevice and QPrinter.
trans-unit.target: 此枚举类型列出了Postscript PPD标准中定义的可用页面大小。这些值在QPagedPaintDevice和QPrinter中重复。

trans-unit.source: This enum type lists the available page sizes as defined in the Postscript PPD standard. These values are duplicated in QPagedPaintDevice and QPrinter.
trans-unit.target: 此枚举类型列出了Postscript PPD标准中定义的可用页面大小。这些值在QPagedPaintDevice和QPrinter 中重复。

trans-unit.source: This enum type lists the available page sizes as defined in the Postscript PPD standard. These values are duplicated in QPageSize and QPrinter.
trans-unit.target: 此枚举类型列出了Postscript PPD标准中定义的可用页面大小。这些值在QPageSize和QPrinter 中重复。

trans-unit.source: This enum type lists the behavior of QTabBar when a tab is removed and the tab being removed is also the current tab.
trans-unit.target: 此枚举类型列出了在删除选项卡并且要删除的选项卡也是当前选项卡时QTabBar的行为。

trans-unit.source: This enum type lists the built-in shapes supported by QTabBar. Treat these as hints as some styles may not render some of the shapes. However, position should be honored.
trans-unit.target: 此枚举类型列出了QTabBar支持的内置形状。将这些视为提示，因为某些样式可能无法呈现某些形状。但是，位置应该得到尊重。

trans-unit.source: This enum type lists the location of the widget on a tab.
trans-unit.target: 此枚举类型列出了小组件在标签上的位置。

trans-unit.source: This enum type lists types of URL syntax.
trans-unit.target: 这个枚举类型列出了URL语法的类型。

trans-unit.source: This enum type provides a way to specify an edge or corner of the surface.
trans-unit.target: 这个枚举类型提供了一种方法来指定曲面的边缘或角。

trans-unit.source: This enum type provides different focus behaviors for tab navigation.
trans-unit.target: 这个枚举类型为标签导航提供了不同的焦点行为。

trans-unit.source: This enum type specifies a corner in a rectangle:
trans-unit.target: 这个枚举类型指定了一个矩形的角。

trans-unit.source: This enum type specifies an edge in a rectangle:
trans-unit.target: 这个枚举类型指定了一个矩形的边缘。

trans-unit.source: This enum type specifies security options that should apply to a URL scheme.
trans-unit.target: 这个枚举类型指定了应适用于URL方案的安全选项。

trans-unit.source: This enum type specifies settings for web pages:
trans-unit.target: 该枚举类型指定了网页的设置。

trans-unit.source: This enum type specifies the data type of the proxy.
trans-unit.target: 此枚举类型指定代理的数据类型。

trans-unit.source: This enum type specifies the different syntaxes for specifying placeholders in prepared queries.
trans-unit.target: 这个枚举类型指定了在准备好的查询中指定占位符的不同语法。

trans-unit.source: This enum type specifies the orientation in which camera field of view is given.
trans-unit.target: 此枚举类型指定了摄像机视场的方向。

trans-unit.source: This enum type specifies the orientation in which camera field of view is given:
trans-unit.target: 此枚举类型指定了摄像机视场的方向。

trans-unit.source: This enum type specifies the polar orientation of an axis.
trans-unit.target: 这个枚举类型指定轴的极性方向。

trans-unit.source: This enum type specifies the possible error values for a remote call:
trans-unit.target: 这个枚举类型指定了远程调用的可能错误值。

trans-unit.source: This enum type specifies the priority of an event posted to the state machine using postEvent().
trans-unit.target: 此枚举类型指定使用postEvent（）发布到状态机的事件的优先级。

trans-unit.source: This enum type specifies the reason for failure if a transaction has the PurchaseFailed status.
trans-unit.target: 此枚举类型指定如果事务具有PurchaseFailed状态的失败原因。

trans-unit.source: This enum type specifies the storage format used by QSettings.
trans-unit.target: 此枚举类型指定QSettings使用的存储格式。

trans-unit.source: This enum type specifies the type of an SCXML event:
trans-unit.target: 这个枚举类型指定了一个SCXML事件的类型。

trans-unit.source: This enum type specifies the type of the axis object.
trans-unit.target: 这个枚举类型指定轴对象的类型。

trans-unit.source: This enum type specifies the various error codes associated with QRemoteObjectNode errors:
trans-unit.target: 此枚举类型指定与QRemoteObjectNode错误相关的各种错误代码：

trans-unit.source: This enum type specifies the various orientations a screen might have.
trans-unit.target: 该枚举类型指定了屏幕可能具有的各种方向。

trans-unit.source: This enum type specifies the various state codes associated with QRemoteObjectReplica states:
trans-unit.target: 此枚举类型指定与QRemoteObjectReplica状态相关的各种状态代码：

trans-unit.source: This enum type specifies what paper size QPrinter should use. QPrinter does not check that the paper size is available; it just uses this information, together with QPrinter::Orientation and QPrinter::setFullPage(), to determine the printable area.
trans-unit.target: 此枚举类型指定QPrinter应该使用的纸张尺寸。QPrinter不检查纸张尺寸是否可用。它仅使用此信息以及QPrinter :: Orientation和QPrinter :: setFullPage（）来确定可打印区域。

trans-unit.source: This enum type specifies what paper source QPrinter is to use. QPrinter does not check that the paper source is available; it just uses this information to try and set the paper source. Whether it will set the paper source depends on whether the printer has that particular source.
trans-unit.target: 此枚举类型指定使用QPrinter的纸张来源。QPrinter不检查纸张来源是否可用。它只是使用此信息来尝试设置纸张来源。是否设置纸张来源取决于打印机是否具有该特定来源。

trans-unit.source: This enumerated type describes the range of years (in the Gregorian calendar) representable by QDateTime:
trans-unit.target: 此枚举类型描述了QDateTime可表示的年份范围（在公历中）：

trans-unit.source: This enumerated type is used to specify a choice of calendar system.

trans-unit.source: This enumeration contains all possible CBOR types as decoded by QCborStreamReader. CBOR has 7 major types, plus a number of simple types carrying no value, and floating point values.
trans-unit.target: 此枚举包含为解码通过所有可能的CBOR类型QCborStreamReader。CBOR有7种主要类型，还有一些不包含任何值的简单类型以及浮点值。

trans-unit.source: This enumeration describes certain events that occur during camera usage. You can associate some form of feedback to be given when the event occurs, or check whether feedback for this event is enabled or locked so that changes cannot be made.
trans-unit.target: 此枚举描述了摄像机使用期间发生的某些事件。您可以在事件发生时关联某种形式的反馈,或者检查该事件的反馈是否已启用或锁定,以便无法进行更改。

trans-unit.source: This event handler, for GraphicsSceneMove events, is delivered after the widget has moved (e.g., its local position has changed).

trans-unit.source: This event handler, for GraphicsSceneResize events, is delivered after the widget has been resized (i.e., its local size has changed).

trans-unit.source: This event handler, for Hide events, is delivered after the widget has been hidden, for example, setVisible(false) has been called for the widget or one of its ancestors when the widget was previously shown.

trans-unit.source: This event handler, for Show events, is delivered before the widget has been shown, for example, setVisible(true) has been called for the widget or one of its ancestors when the widget was previously hidden.
trans-unit.target: 对于Show事件，此事件处理程序是在显示窗口小部件之前传递的，例如，先前隐藏窗口小部件时，已为窗口小部件或其祖先之一调用setVisible（true）。

trans-unit.target: 这个事件处理程序,对于事件

trans-unit.source: This event is always preceded by a QDragEnterEvent and a series of QDragMoveEvents. It is not sent if a QDropEvent is sent instead.
trans-unit.target: 此事件始终在QDragEnterEvent和一系列QDragMoveEvent之前。如果发送QDropEvent而不发送它。

trans-unit.source: This event is delivered to the item by the scene at some point after it has been constructed, but before it is shown or otherwise accessed through the scene. You can use this event handler to do last-minute initializations of the widget which require the item to be fully constructed.
trans-unit.target: 该事件由场景在项目被构造后,但在它被显示或通过场景访问之前的某个时间点传递给它。您可以使用此事件处理程序来进行小组件的最后一分钟初始化,这需要项目完全构造。

trans-unit.source: This event is only delivered when the item is moved locally. Calling setTransform() or moving any of the item's ancestors does not affect the item's local position.
trans-unit.target: 仅当项目在本地移动时才传递此事件。调用setTransform（）或移动项目的任何祖先都不会影响项目的本地位置。

trans-unit.source: This event is only delivered when the widget is resized locally; calling setTransform() on the widget or any of its ancestors or view, does not affect the widget's local size.
trans-unit.target: 仅当在本地调整窗口小部件的大小时才传递此事件。在窗口小部件或其任何祖先或视图上调用setTransform（）不会影响窗口小部件的本地大小。

trans-unit.source: This event is only used to notify the application of a request. It may be safely ignored.
trans-unit.target: 该事件仅用于通知请求的申请。它可以被安全地忽略。

trans-unit.source: This event is sent just before QWidget::hide() returns, and also when a top-level window has been hidden (iconified) by the user.
trans-unit.target: 该事件在QWidget :: hide（）返回之前，以及在用户隐藏（显示）了顶层窗口时发送。

trans-unit.source: This event should not be used to paint. To handle painting implement paintEvent() instead.
trans-unit.target: 此事件不应用于绘画。要处理绘画，请改用paintEvent（）。

trans-unit.source: This example adds inline GeoJSON data to the map. Simply adding a source is not enough to get the data visible. It is also necessary to create a layer based on this source. After the layer is added, we also need to style its paint and layout properties. In this case we are changing the line color to blue, and the line width to 8 pixels, as well as also setting round line joints and caps.
trans-unit.target: 本示例将嵌入式GeoJSON数据添加到地图。仅仅添加一个源还不足以使数据可见。也有必要基于此源创建一个图层。添加图层后，我们还需要设置其绘画和布局属性的样式。在这种情况下，我们将线条颜色更改为蓝色，将线条宽度更改为8像素，还设置了圆形的线接点和盖帽。

trans-unit.source: This example also shows that changing an attribute received from an element changes the attribute of the element. If you do not want to change the value of the element's attribute you must use cloneNode() to get an independent copy of the attribute.
trans-unit.target: 此示例还显示，更改从元素接收的属性会更改元素的属性。如果不想更改元素属性的值，则必须使用cloneNode（）获得属性的独立副本。

trans-unit.source: This example can be saved as "ClickableHelloWorld.qml" and run with qmlscene. Whenever the user clicks anywhere in the window, the rectangle will change from red to blue.
trans-unit.target: 这个例子可以保存为 "ClickableHelloWorld.qml",并用qmlscene运行。每当用户点击窗口中的任何地方,矩形就会从红色变为蓝色。

trans-unit.source: This example illustrates that objects can work together without needing to know any information about each other. To enable this, the objects only need to be connected together, and this can be achieved with some simple QObject::connect() function calls, or with uic's automatic connections feature.
trans-unit.target: 此示例说明了对象可以一起工作，而无需了解彼此的任何信息。为此，只需要将对象连接在一起即可，这可以通过一些简单的QObject :: connect（）函数调用或uic的自动连接功能来实现。

trans-unit.source: This example shows the stacking order of all limbs of the robot from the Drag and Drop Robot example. The torso is the root item (all other items are children or descendants of the torso), so it is drawn first. Next, the head is drawn, as it is the first item in the torso's list of children. Then the upper left arm is drawn. As the lower arm is a child of the upper arm, the lower arm is then drawn, followed by the upper arm's next sibling, which is the upper right arm, and so on.
trans-unit.target: 本示例显示了拖放机器人示例中机器人所有肢体的堆叠顺序。躯干是根项（所有其他项是躯干的子代或后代），因此首先绘制它。接下来，绘制头部，因为它是躯干孩子列表中的第一项。然后绘制左上臂。由于下臂是上臂的子代，因此先绘制下臂，然后是上臂的下一个兄弟姐妹，即右上臂，依此类推。

trans-unit.source: This example will illustrate the use of a Registry for building the node topology. For only two nodes, the benefits of using a registry are minimal. With a registry, instead of using a QUrl to create a direct connection between two nodes, you use a different QUrl to point both the host and replica nodes to the registry. As the network grows, using a registry means that all nodes only need to connect to the registry via a single QUrl. With direct connections, nodes would have to maintain a list of QUrls for each node they link to.
trans-unit.target: 本示例将说明如何使用注册表来构建节点拓扑。对于仅两个节点，使用注册表的好处很小。使用注册表，而不是使用QUrl在两个节点之间创建直接连接，而是使用不同的QUrl将主机节点和副本节点都指向注册表。随着网络的发展，使用注册表意味着所有节点仅需要通过单个QUrl连接到注册表。使用直接连接时，节点必须为其链接到的每个节点维护一个QUrl的列表。

trans-unit.source: This feature makes it easy to change the configuration for a project without losing all the custom settings that might be needed for a specific configuration. In the above code, the declarations in the first scope are processed, and the final executable will be called application-gl. However, if opengl is not specified, the declarations in the second scope are processed instead, and the final executable will be called application.
trans-unit.target: 使用此功能可以轻松更改项目的配置，而不会丢失特定配置可能需要的所有自定义设置。在上面的代码中，处理了第一个作用域中的声明，最终的可执行文件称为 application-gl 。但是，如果未指定 opengl ，则会处理第二个作用域中的声明，最终的可执行文件将称为 application 。

trans-unit.source: This feature of the language allows for behavioural changes to be made without breaking existing applications. Consequently QML module authors should always remember to document what changed between minor versions, and QML module users should check that their application still runs correctly before deploying an updated import statement.
trans-unit.target: 该语言的这一特性允许在不破坏现有应用程序的情况下进行行为改变。因此,QML模块的作者应该始终记得记录小版本之间的变化,QML模块的用户应该在部署更新的导入语句之前检查他们的应用程序是否仍然正确运行。

trans-unit.source: This first post processing step is to execute any user provided post processing effects. These are defined in an ordered list by the SceneEnvironment::effects property. The way this works is that each post processing effect is part of a chain such that the output of the previous effect is the input for the next. The first effect in this chain gets its input directly from the output of the scene renderer step. It is also possible to for effects to access the depth texture output of the scene renderer.
trans-unit.target: 该第一后处理步骤是执行任何用户提供的后处理效果。这些由SceneEnvironment :: effects属性在有序列表中定义。这种工作方式是，每个后期处理效果都是链的一部分，因此前一个效果的输出就是下一个效果的输入。该链中的第一个效果直接从场景渲染器步骤的输出获取其输入。效果也可以访问场景渲染器的深度纹理输出。

trans-unit.source: This flag also adds an arg() function to the string prototype.
trans-unit.target: 此标志还将 arg() 函数添加到字符串原型。

trans-unit.source: This flag can be used to indicate to the platform plugin that "all" window manager protocols should be disabled. This flag will behave different depending on what operating system the application is running on and what window manager is running. The flag can be used to get a native window with no configuration set.
trans-unit.target: 此标志可用于向平台插件指示 "所有 "窗口管理器协议应被禁用。该标志将根据应用程序运行的操作系统和运行的窗口管理器而表现不同。该标志可用于获得一个没有设置配置的本地窗口。

trans-unit.source: This flag indicates that all of the item's direct or indirect children only draw within the item's shape. Unlike ItemClipsChildrenToShape, this restriction is not enforced. Set ItemContainsChildrenInShape when you manually assure that drawing is bound to the item's shape and want to avoid the cost associated with enforcing the clip. Setting this flag enables more efficient drawing and collision detection. The flag is disabled by default.
trans-unit.target: 这个标志表示项目的所有直接或间接子项目只在项目的形状内绘制。与ItemClipsChildrenToShape不同,这个限制并不强制执行。当您手动保证绘图绑定在项的形状上,并希望避免执行夹子的相关成本时,请设置 ItemContainsChildrenInShape。设置该标志可以更有效地进行绘图和碰撞检测。该标志默认为禁用。

trans-unit.source: This flag is set by the scene graph, not by the QSGMaterial. When set, and that can only happen when SupportsRhiShader was set by the material, it indicates that createShader() must return a QSGMaterialRhiShader instance instead of QSGMaterialShader.
trans-unit.target: 该标志是由场景图设置的，而不是由QSGMaterial设置的。设置后，并且仅当材质设置了SupportsRhiShader时才会发生，这表明createShader（）必须返回QSGMaterialRhiShader实例而不是QSGMaterialShader。

trans-unit.source: This flipable item has a flipped boolean property that is toggled whenever the MouseArea within the flipable is clicked. When flipped is true, the item changes to the "back" state; in this state, the angle of the Rotation item is changed to 180 degrees to produce the flipping effect. When flipped is false, the item reverts to the default state, in which the angle value is 0.

trans-unit.source: This function can be used to determine the platform-specific proxy settings. If they don't, this function will just return a QNetworkProxy of type QNetworkProxy::NoProxy.

trans-unit.source: This function can be used to make long running tasks cleanly interruptible. Never checking or acting on the value returned by this function is safe, however it is advisable do so regularly in long running functions. Take care not to call it too often, to keep the overhead low.
trans-unit.target: 这个函数可以用来使长期运行的任务可以干净地中断。从不检查或操作这个函数返回的值是安全的,但是在长期运行的函数中建议定期这样做。注意不要太频繁地调用它,以保持较低的开销。

trans-unit.source: This function causes the QQmlEngine::exit(int) signal to be emitted. Within the Prototyping with qmlscene, this causes the launcher application to exit the specified return code. trans-unit.source: This function causes the QQmlEngine::quit() signal to be emitted. Within the Prototyping with qmlscene, this causes the launcher application to exit; to quit a C++ application when this method is called, connect the QQmlEngine::quit() signal to the QCoreApplication::quit() slot.

trans-unit.source: This function depends on the platform and the backend. It may not work at all, it may take several seconds before it takes effect, or it may pause instantly. Some synthesizers will look for a break that they can later resume from, such as a sentence end.

trans-unit.target: 调用时，此函数与QPicture :: play（）完全相同

trans-unit.target: 该功能不允许

trans-unit.target: 该函数不会改变任何画布属性(即它们可以在其他地方设置)。

trans-unit.source: This function does not cache the system environment. Therefore, it's possible to obtain an updated version of the environment if low-level C library functions like setenv or putenv have been called.
trans-unit.target: 此功能不缓存系统环境。因此，如果调用了 setenv 或 putenv 等低级C库函数，则可以获得环境的更新版本。

trans-unit.source: This function does not cause an immediate paint; instead it schedules a paint request that is processed by QGraphicsView after control reaches the event loop. The item will only be redrawn if it is visible in any associated view.
trans-unit.target: 此功能不会引起立即上漆；相反，它计划在控件到达事件循环后由QGraphicsView处理的绘制请求。如果该项目在任何关联的视图中可见，则将仅重画该项目。

trans-unit.source: This function does not cause an immediate paint; instead it schedules a paint request that is processed by the QML Scene Graph when the next frame is rendered. The item will only be redrawn if it is visible.
trans-unit.target: 该函数不会立即绘制,而是在下一帧渲染时,由QML场景图处理一个绘制请求。只有在项目可见的情况下才会重新绘制。

trans-unit.source: This function does not cause an immediate repaint; instead it schedules a paint event for processing when Qt returns to the main event loop. This permits Qt to optimize for more speed and less flicker than a call to repaint() does.
trans-unit.target: 此功能不会立即重绘；相反，当Qt返回到主事件循环时，它将安排一个绘画事件进行处理。与调用repaint（）相比，这允许Qt优化以提高速度和减少闪烁。

trans-unit.source: This function does not clear the color, depth and stencil buffers. Use QQuickWindow::setClearBeforeRendering to control clearing of the color buffer. The depth and stencil buffer might be clobbered by the scene graph renderer. Clear these manually on demand.
trans-unit.target: 此功能不会清除颜色，深度和模板缓冲区。使用QQuickWindow :: setClearBeforeRendering控制颜色缓冲区的清除。场景图形渲染器可能会破坏深度和模板缓冲区。根据需要手动清除这些。

trans-unit.source: This function does not fall back to the 'C' locale if the string cannot be interpreted in this locale.
trans-unit.target: 如果字符串不能被解释为'C'语言,该函数不会返回到'C'语言。

trans-unit.source: This function does not guarantee the returned host name is a Fully Qualified Domain Name (FQDN). For that, use QHostInfo to resolve the returned name to an FQDN.
trans-unit.target: 此函数不能保证返回的主机名是完全合格的域名（FQDN）。为此，请使用QHostInfo将返回的名称解析为FQDN。

trans-unit.source: This function is a Qt implementation of C++17's std::as_const(), a cast function like std::move(). But while std::move() turns lvalues into rvalues, this function turns non-const lvalues into const lvalues. Like std::as_const(), it doesn't work on rvalues, because it cannot be efficiently implemented for rvalues without leaving dangling references.
trans-unit.target: 这个函数是C++17的std::as_const()的Qt实现,是一个类似于std::move()的投射函数,但std::move()把lvalues变成rvalues,这个函数把非const的lvalues变成const的lvalues。但当 std::move()将 lvalues 变成 rvalues 时,这个函数将非const lvalues 变成 const lvalues。像std::as_const()一样,它不能在rvalues上工作,因为它不能有效地实现rvalues而不留下悬而未决的引用。

trans-unit.source: This function is called by Qt to create a new QGesture object for the given
trans-unit.target: Qt调用此函数为给定的对象创建一个新的QGesture对象

trans-unit.source: This function is called by the default implementations of contains() and collidesWithPath().
trans-unit.target: 此函数由contains（）和collidesWithPath（）的默认实现调用。

trans-unit.source: This function is called by the framework to allow the recognizer to filter input events dispatched to QWidget or QGraphicsObject instances that it is monitoring.
trans-unit.target: 框架调用此函数，以允许识别器过滤分配给正在监视的QWidget或QGraphicsObject实例的输入事件。

trans-unit.source: This function is called by the framework to allow the recognizer to filter input events dispatched to QWidget or QGraphicsObject instances that it is monitoring.
trans-unit.target: 框架调用此函数，以允许识别器过滤分配给正在监视的QWidget或QGraphicsObject实例的输入事件。

trans-unit.source: This function is called by the framework to reset a given
trans-unit.target: 这个函数被框架调用来重置给定的

trans-unit.source: This function is called by the general data() getter and by the convenience getters (text(), html(), urls(), imageData(), and colorData()). You can reimplement it if you want to store your data using a custom data structure (instead of a QByteArray, which is what setData() provides). You would then also need to reimplement hasFormat() and formats().
trans-unit.target: 通用data（）getter和便捷getter（text（），html（），urls（），imageData（）和colorData（））调用此函数。如果你想使用自定义的数据结构（而不是存储你的数据，你可以重新实现它的QByteArray，这是使用setData（）提供）。这样，你会还需要重新实现hasFormat（）和格式（）。

trans-unit.source: This function is called by the layout system. It is used only if PM_LayoutHorizontalSpacing or PM_LayoutVerticalSpacing returns a negative value.
trans-unit.target: 此功能由布局系统调用。仅当PM_LayoutHorizo​​ntalSpacing或PM_LayoutVerticalSpacing返回负值时使用。

trans-unit.source: This function is called by the renderer and should paint this node with directly invoking commands in the graphics API (OpenGL, Direct3D, etc.) currently in use.
trans-unit.target: 这个函数被渲染器调用,应该直接调用当前使用的图形API(OpenGL、Direct3D等)中的命令来绘制这个节点。

trans-unit.source: This function is called by the rich text engine to request data that isn't directly stored by QTextDocument, but still associated with it. For example, images are referenced indirectly by the name attribute of a QTextImageFormat object.
trans-unit.target: RTF引擎会调用此函数，以请求不是由QTextDocument直接存储但仍与之关联的数据。例如，图像由QTextImageFormat对象的name属性间接引用。

trans-unit.source: This function is called by the scene graph before geometry is rendered to make sure the shader is in the right state.
trans-unit.target: 这个函数在几何体渲染之前被场景图调用,以确保着色器处于正确的状态。

trans-unit.source: This function is called by the scene graph to enable the material to provide a custom set of graphics state. The set of states that are customizable by material is limited to blending and related settings.
trans-unit.target: 该函数被场景图调用,使材质能够提供一组自定义的图形状态。材质可自定义的状态集仅限于混合和相关设置。

trans-unit.source: This function is called by the scene graph to get the contents of the shader program's uniform buffer updated. The implementation is not expected to perform any real graphics operations, it is merely responsible for copying data to the QByteArray returned from RenderState::uniformData(). The scene graph takes care of making that buffer visible in the shaders.
trans-unit.target: 场景图调用此函数以更新着色器程序统一缓冲区的内容。该实现不希望执行任何实际的图形操作，它仅负责将数据复制到从RenderState :: uniformData（）返回的QByteArray中。场景图负责使该缓冲区在着色器中可见。

trans-unit.source: This function is called by the scene graph to get the contents of the shader program's uniform buffer updated. The implementation is not expected to perform any real graphics operations, it is merely responsible for copying data to the QByteArray returned from RenderState::uniformData(). The scene graph takes care of making that buffer visible in the shaders.
trans-unit.target: 场景图调用此函数以更新着色器程序统一缓冲区的内容。该实现不希望执行任何实际的图形操作，它仅负责将数据复制到从RenderState :: uniformData（）返回的QByteArray中。场景图负责使该缓冲区在着色器中可见。

trans-unit.source: This function is called by the scene graph to indicate that geometry is about to be rendered using this shader.
trans-unit.target: 这个函数被场景图调用,以表明即将使用这个着色器渲染几何体。

trans-unit.source: This function is called by the scene graph to indicate that geometry will no longer to be rendered using this shader.
trans-unit.target: 这个函数被场景图调用,表示不再使用这个着色器渲染几何体。

trans-unit.source: This function is called by the scene graph to prepare using a sampled image in the shader, typically in form of a combined image sampler.
trans-unit.target: 该函数被场景图调用,以在着色器中使用采样图像进行准备,通常以组合图像采样器的形式。

trans-unit.source: This function is called by the scene graph to return a unique instance per subclass.
trans-unit.target: 这个函数被场景图调用,以返回每个子类的唯一实例。

trans-unit.source: This function is called continuously with the given
trans-unit.target: 这个函数在给定的

trans-unit.source: This function is called during the scene graph sync phase when the GUI thread is blocked.
trans-unit.target: 当GUI线程被阻塞时,该函数在场景图同步阶段被调用。

trans-unit.source: This function is called for absolute URLs that are prefixed with http:// or https:// and for unrecognized schemes, such as mailto:, which will be handled by QDesktopServices if accepted. To have this function called also upon receiving navigation requests to local URLs, prefix the URLs with http://.
trans-unit.target: 对于以 http:// 或 https:// 为前缀的绝对URL 以及无法识别的方案（例如 mailto: ：），将调用此函数，如果接受，这些方案将由QDesktopServices处理。要在接收到对本地URL的导航请求时也调用此功能，请在URL前面添加 http:// 。

trans-unit.source: This function is called for every area light for the back-facing polygon.
trans-unit.target: 该函数对背向多边形的每一个区域灯都会被调用。

trans-unit.source: This function is called for every area light for the front-facing polygon.
trans-unit.target: 该函数对正面多边形的每一个区域灯都会被调用。

trans-unit.source: This function is called for every light (excluding area lights) for the back-facing polygon. The material can write its own lighting model or use the provided functions. The functions available for use are microfacetBSDF, physGlossyBSDF and simpleGlossyBSDF. The normal is the fragment normal. The lightDir is the normalized vector from fragment to light in world space.
trans-unit.target: 背面多边形的每个灯光（不包括区域灯光）都会调用此函数。材质可以编写自己的照明模型或使用提供的功能。可使用的功能 microfacetBSDF ， physGlossyBSDF 和 simpleGlossyBSDF 。的 normal 是片段正常。所述 lightDir 是从片段的归一化矢量，以光在世界空间。

trans-unit.source: This function is called for every light (excluding area lights) for the front-facing polygon. The material can write its own lighting model or use the provided functions. The functions available for use are microfacetBSDF, physGlossyBSDF, and simpleGlossyBSDF. The normal is the fragment normal. The lightDir is the normalized vector from fragment to light in world space.
trans-unit.target: 面向正面多边形的每个灯光（不包括区域灯光）都会调用此函数。材质可以编写自己的照明模型或使用提供的功能。可使用的功能 microfacetBSDF ， physGlossyBSDF 和 simpleGlossyBSDF 。的 normal 是片段正常。所述 lightDir 是从片段的归一化矢量，以光在世界空间。

trans-unit.source: This function is called on the rendering thread.
trans-unit.target: 该函数在渲染线程上被调用。

trans-unit.source: This function is called on the scene graph rendering thread to create a QSGTexture instance from the factory.
trans-unit.target: 在场景图形渲染线程上调用此函数以从工厂创建QSGTexture实例。

trans-unit.source: This function is called on the thread on which the Qt Quick scene graph performs rendering, with the OpenGL context bound. Ownership of the returned instance is transferred: the returned instance will live on the render thread and will be destroyed automatically when necessary.
trans-unit.target: 该函数在Qt Quick场景图执行渲染的线程上被调用,并绑定OpenGL上下文。返回实例的所有权被转移:返回的实例将在渲染线程上生存,必要时将自动销毁。

trans-unit.source: This function is called once for each QML test file, so any arguments are unique to that test. For example, this means that each QML test file will have its own QML engine.
trans-unit.target: 这个函数对每个QML测试文件都会被调用一次,所以任何参数对该测试都是唯一的。例如,这意味着每个QML测试文件将有自己的QML引擎。

trans-unit.source: This function is called once to calculate the environmental light for the back-facing polygon.
trans-unit.target: 这个函数被调用一次,计算背向多边形的环境光照。

trans-unit.source: This function is called once to calculate the environmental light for the front-facing polygon.
trans-unit.target: 该函数被调用一次,用于计算正面多边形的环境光线。

trans-unit.source: This function is called only if the material is transmissive after computeLayerWeights has been called.
trans-unit.target: 仅当材料在 computeLayerWeights 被调用后才具有透射性时，才调用此函数。

trans-unit.source: This function is called only if the material is transparent and non-transmissive after computeLayerWeights has been called.
trans-unit.target: 仅当材质在调用 computeLayerWeights 之后是透明且不透射的时，才调用此函数。

trans-unit.source: This function is called to allow the material to initialize layer parameters.
trans-unit.target: 调用此函数是为了让材料初始化层参数。

trans-unit.source: This function is called to begin a transaction. If successful, return true, otherwise return false. The default implementation does nothing and returns false.

trans-unit.target: 这个函数被调用来计算材料所需的任何临时值,它在任何其他函数之前被调用。

trans-unit.source: This function is called to commit a transaction. If successful, return true, otherwise return false. The default implementation does nothing and returns false.
trans-unit.target: 调用此函数来提交事务。如果成功，则返回true，否则返回false。默认实现不执行任何操作，并返回 false 。

trans-unit.source: This function is called to compute the index of refraction for the material. Return material index of refraction.
trans-unit.target: 该函数用于计算材料的折射率。返回材料的折射率。

trans-unit.target: 这个函数被调用来初始化

trans-unit.target: 需要新的FBO时调用此函数。这发生在初始帧上。如果QQuickFramebufferObject :: textureFollowsItemSize设置为true，则每次项目尺寸更改时都会再次调用它。

trans-unit.source: This function is called when all custom graphics resources allocated by this node have to be freed immediately. In case the node does not directly allocate graphics resources (buffers, textures, render targets, fences, etc.) through the graphics API that is in use, there is nothing to do here.

trans-unit.source: This function is only called if the result is in an active state. Derived classes must reimplement this function and position the result to the first record, and call setAt() with an appropriate value. Return true to indicate success, or false to signify failure.
trans-unit.target: 仅当结果处于活动状态时才调用此函数。派生类必须重新实现此函数，并将结果定位到第一条记录，并使用适当的值调用setAt（）。返回true表示成功，返回false表示失败。

trans-unit.source: This function is only called if the result is in an active state. Derived classes must reimplement this function and position the result to the last record, and call setAt() with an appropriate value. Return true to indicate success, or false to signify failure.
trans-unit.target: 仅当结果处于活动状态时才调用此函数。派生类必须重新实现此函数并将结果定位到最后一条记录，并使用适当的值调用setAt（）。返回true表示成功，返回false表示失败。

trans-unit.source: This function is only called if the result is in an active state. Derived classes must reimplement this function and position the result to the row

trans-unit.source: This function is only called if the result is in an active state. The default implementation calls fetch() with the next index. Derived classes can reimplement this function and position the result to the next record in some other way, and call setAt() with an appropriate value. Return true to indicate success, or false to signify failure.
trans-unit.target: 仅当结果处于活动状态时才调用此函数。默认实现使用下一个索引调用fetch（）。派生的类可以重新实现此函数，并以其他方式将结果定位到下一条记录，然后使用适当的值调用setAt（）。返回true表示成功，返回false表示失败。

trans-unit.source: This function is only called if the result is in an active state. The default implementation calls fetch() with the previous index. Derived classes can reimplement this function and position the result to the next record in some other way, and call setAt() with an appropriate value. Return true to indicate success, or false to signify failure.
trans-unit.target: 仅当结果处于活动状态时才调用此函数。默认实现使用上一个索引调用fetch（）。派生的类可以重新实现此函数，并以其他方式将结果定位到下一条记录，然后使用适当的值调用setAt（）。返回true表示成功，返回false表示失败。

trans-unit.source: This function is slow compared to the other Unicode conversions. Use QString(const QChar *, int) or QString(const QChar *) if possible.

trans-unit.source: This function is suitable for calling also when the underlying platform window is already destroyed. This means that it is safe to call this function from a QOpenGLWindow subclass' destructor. If there is no native window anymore, an offscreen surface is used instead. This ensures that OpenGL resource cleanup operations in the destructor will always work, as long as this function is called first.
trans-unit.target: 当基础平台窗口已被破坏时，此函数也适用于调用。这意味着从QOpenGLWindow子类的析构函数调用此函数是安全的。如果不再存在本机窗口，则使用屏幕外表面。这样可以确保析构函数中的OpenGL资源清除操作始终有效，只要首先调用此函数即可。

trans-unit.source: This function is suitable for method calls only. It is guaranteed that the slot will be called exactly once with the reply, as long as the parameter types match and no error occurs.
trans-unit.target: 这个函数只适合方法调用。保证只要参数类型匹配且不发生错误,该槽将与回复精确调用一次。
